findings.name: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
findings.description: Stored XSS vulnerability detected where user input is stored and displayed without proper sanitization
findings.evidence: Payload 'Test' was stored and reflected in the response
findings.remediation: Implement proper input sanitization and output encoding. Use a Content Security Policy (CSP) and consider using a library like DOMPurify for sanitization.

findings.name: SQL Injection in Known Vulnerable Path
findings.description: SQL injection vulnerability detected in /listproducts.php?cat=1 parameter: cat
findings.evidence: Multiple payloads were successful. Examples: Parameter 'cat' with payload '' OR JSON_EXTRACT('[1]', '$[0]') = 1 --' triggered error pattern: SQL syntax.*?MySQL
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries or prepared statements. Validate and sanitize all user inputs.

findings.name: SQL Injection in Known Vulnerable Path
findings.description: SQL injection vulnerability detected in /artists.php?artist=1 parameter: artist
findings.evidence: Multiple payloads were successful. Examples: Parameter 'artist' with payload '' OR '1'='1' --' triggered error pattern: SQL syntax.*?MySQL
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries or prepared statements. Validate and sanitize all user inputs.

findings.name: SQL Injection
findings.description: SQL injection vulnerability detected in form parameter: searchFor
findings.evidence: Parameter 'searchFor' with payload '" OR "1"="1' --' triggered error pattern: SQL syntax.*?MySQL
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries or prepared statements. Validate and sanitize all user inputs.

findings.name: Potential File Upload Paths Detected
findings.description: Found 56 potential file upload paths that could be used for file upload attacks
findings.evidence: Found 56 upload directories (6 verified, 0 with directory listing)
findings.remediation: Review and secure these upload paths. Consider implementing proper access controls and validations for file uploads.

findings.name: Multiple Upload Paths on testphp.vulnweb.com
findings.description: Found 56 potential file upload paths on testphp.vulnweb.com (6 verified)
findings.evidence: Paths: http://testphp.vulnweb.com/images, http://testphp.vulnweb.com/images, http://testphp.vulnweb.com/pictures, http://testphp.vulnweb.com/pictures, http://testphp.vulnweb.com/admin...
findings.remediation: Review and secure upload directories. Implement proper access controls and file validation.
